title: How Lamar Jackson and Daniel Jones Are Making Their Cases for New Contracts
description: Quarterbacks Lamar Jackson of the Ravens and Daniel Jones of the Giants are stating their cases for new contracts, but they do so under starkly different conditions.
dc:creator: Emmanuel Morgan
